posts.post_title: WTB: Graded Shag Old Mill and Ed Hahn
posts.post_content:
I’m hoping someone out there has graded versions of two T206 cards I’m struggling to locate:

Shag Shaughnessy - Old Mill
Ed Hahn

Can pay cash or offer trades. Feel free to send me what you have: [url]helfrich91@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks!
Todd
